thread.section_title: LIC Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good place
thread.title_full: Good place - Review of LIC Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: anttheman
title: Good place
text:
Close to subway e line and g line nice little town has a few amenities close by felt quite safe walking round rooms were good and clean really big double bed king size I would say
Showers hot and powerful !
Staff were nice
Breakfast was basic -toast scrambled egg American bacon and sausages you can order hash browns
Cereal two types coffee/tea
Didn't like that they charge your card on first day you arrive with out telling you
Room has all you expect tv/iron/safe/phone
No wardrobes just a rail
Rooftop seating but we didn't use march is cold
